item.title: 欧洲公司躲过特朗普贸易战 "飓风"，但感叹关税提高
item.description: 周一，欧洲企业不知道是该为来之不易的美国贸易协议欢呼，还是该为与唐纳德-特朗普总统第二任期前相比仍在大幅飙升的关税哀叹。【原文：European companies were left wondering on Monday whether to cheer a hard-won U.S. trade deal or lament a still sharp jump in tariffs versus those in place before President Donald Trump's second term.】

item.title: 电动车销量增长，大众斯柯达上半年利润增长 12
item.description: 大众汽车旗下斯柯达汽车公司（Skoda Auto）周一表示，今年上半年，该公司增加了电动汽车在销售组合中的份额，营业利润增长近 12%，达到 13 亿欧元（15.2 亿美元）。【原文：Skoda Auto, a Volkswagen unit, increased the share of electric vehicles in its sales mix in the first half of the year and posted a nearly 12% rise in operating profit to 1.3 billion euros ($1.52 billion), it said on Monday.】

item.title: 解说：五张图表解读大型酒类产品为何需要美国关税减免
item.description: 欧盟与美国周末达成的贸易协议被一些欧洲官员认为是不平衡的，而欧盟葡萄酒和烈酒生产商可能成为该协议中为数不多的赢家。【原文：European Union wine and spirits producers could emerge among the few winners of a EU-U.S. trade deal agreed at the weekend that some European officials consider unbalanced.】

item.title: 独家报道中国消费者投诉显示汽车销售数据普遍被篡改
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）对消费者投诉进行分析后发现，近年来，中国汽车制造商和经销商为应对全球最大汽车市场上激烈的价格战而采取的哄抬汽车销量的手段越来越普遍。【原文：A tactic used by Chinese automakers and dealers to inflate car sales has grown increasingly common in recent years in response to a bruising price war in the world's largest auto market, a Reuters analysis of consumer complaints has found.】

item.title: 大众奥迪以关税和重组为由下调全年业绩展望
item.description: 大众汽车旗下高端品牌奥迪周一下调了全年业绩指导，理由是受到美国提高进口关税和重组费用的影响。【原文：Volkswagen's premium brand Audi on Monday cut its its full-year guidance, citing the impact of higher U.S. import tariffs and restructuring expenses.】

item.title: 消息人士称多位美国高管将于本周访华
item.description: 两位知情人士周一告诉路透社，一个由美国高管组成的高级代表团将于本周前往中国，在美中贸易全国委员会（USCBC）的组织下会见中国高级官员。【原文：A high-level delegation of American executives will travel to China this week to meet senior Chinese officials in a trip organised by the U.S.-China Business Council (USCBC), two sources with knowledge of the visit told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》：特朗普暂停出口管制以支持中国贸易协议
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周一称，美国已暂停限制对华技术出口，以避免干扰与中国政府的贸易谈判，并支持唐纳德-特朗普总统为确保今年与习近平主席会晤所做的努力。【原文：The U.S. has paused curbs on tech exports to China to avoid disrupting trade talks with Beijing and support President Donald Trump's efforts to secure a meeting with President Xi Jinping this year, the Financial Times said on Monday.】

item.title: 啤酒制造商喜力上半年利润超预期
item.description: 荷兰啤酒制造商喜力周一公布，尽管其在欧洲的销售受到拖累，关税风险增加，但其半年有机营业利润仍增长了 7.4%，超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Dutch brewer Heineken on Monday reported a 7.4% rise in half-year organic operating profit, ahead of analyst expectations, even as its sales in Europe dragged and tariff risks increased.】

item.title: 俄罗斯国际航空公司因信息故障取消数十个航班
item.description: 俄罗斯国际航空公司周一取消了数十个航班，因为该公司称其信息系统出现故障。【原文：Russian airline Aeroflot cancelled dozens of flights on Monday after what it called a failure in its information systems.】

item.title: 中国人工智能企业结成联盟，在美国遏制下打造国内生态系统
item.description: 中国的人工智能公司宣布成立两个新的产业联盟，旨在发展国内生态系统，减少对外国技术的依赖，同时寻求应对美国对先进的英伟达芯片组的出口限制。【原文：China's artificial intelligence companies have announced two new industry alliances, aiming to develop a domestic ecosystem to reduce dependence on foreign tech as they seek to cope with U.S. export restrictions on advanced Nvidia chipsets.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美国和欧盟避免关税冲突
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 中美就延长关税休战展开新谈判，为特朗普与习近平会晤铺平道路
item.description: 中美两国高级经济官员将于周一在斯德哥尔摩重开会谈，试图解决作为世界前两大经济体之间贸易战核心的长期经济争端，旨在将休战期延长三个月，并阻止大幅提高关税。【原文：Top U.S. and Chinese economic officials will resume talks in Stockholm on Monday to try to tackle longstanding economic disputes at the centre of a trade war between the world's top two economies, aiming to extend a truce by three months and keeping sharply higher tariffs at bay.】

item.title: 欧盟达成协议后，股市为特朗普的贸易协定艺术欢呼雀跃
item.description: 周一，在美国和欧盟达成贸易协议后，全球股市上涨，欧元走强，这提振了市场情绪，并为美联储和日本央行政策会议为首的关键一周提供了明朗的前景。【原文：Global stocks rose and the euro firmed on Monday after a tradeagreement between the United States and the EU lifted sentiment and provided clarity in a pivotal week headlined by the Federal Reserve and the Bank of Japan policy meetings.】

item.title: 美欧达成协议，贸易乐观情绪升温，石油上涨
item.description: 在美国与欧盟达成贸易协议并可能延长与中国的关税暂停期之后，油价周一上涨，从而减少了人们对潜在的更高关税将限制经济活动并影响燃料需求的担忧。【原文：Oil prices rose on Monday after the U.S. reached a trade deal with the European Union and may extend a tariff pause with China, reducing concerns that potentially higher levies would limit economic activity and impact fuel demand.】

item.title: 美国和欧盟达成关税协议后欧元上涨
item.description: 美国和欧盟宣布达成框架贸易协定后，欧元周一上涨，这是避免全球贸易战的一系列协议中的最新一项。【原文：The euro gained on Monday following the announcement of a framework trade agreement between the United States and the European Union, the latest in a flurry of deals to avert a global trade war.】

item.title: 三星电子签订 165 亿美元半导体供应合同
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics）周一表示，它已签署了一份价值 165 亿美元的合同，向一家全球大型企业供应半导体。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Monday it has signed a contract valued at $16.5 billion to supply semiconductors to a major global corporation.】

item.title: 长江和记为 228 亿美元的港口销售寻找中国竞标伙伴
item.description: 长江和记周一表示，希望中国的一家大型战略投资者加入竞购其价值 228 亿美元港口业务的财团，此前有媒体报道称国有企业中国远洋海运集团可能加入该财团。【原文：CK Hutchison said on Monday it wants a major Chinese strategic investor to join the consortium bidding for its $22.8 billion ports business, after media reports that state-owned China COSCO Shipping Corp may join the group.】

item.title: WiseTech Global 任命内部人士 Zubin Appoo 为永久首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚物流软件制造商 WiseTech Global 周一表示，已任命其参谋长 Zubin Appoo 为公司永久首席执行官，接替临时首席执行官 Andrew Cartledge。【原文：Australian logistics software maker WiseTech Global on Monday said it named its chief of staff, Zubin Appoo, as its permanent chief executive, to replace interim CEO Andrew Cartledge.】

item.title: 不敌美国的欧洲接受了最差的美国贸易协定
item.description: 最终，欧洲发现自己缺乏影响力，无法按照自己的条件将唐纳德-特朗普的美国拉入贸易协定，因此签署了一份自己还能接受的协议--尽管这份协议明显对美国有利。【原文：In the end, Europe found it lacked the leverage to pull Donald Trump's America into a trade pact on its terms and so has signed up to a deal it can just about stomach - albeit one that is clearly skewed in the U.S.'s favour.】

item.title: 欧盟与美国周日就贸易协议的主要内容达成一致
item.description: 美国和欧盟周日就一项框架贸易协议达成一致，结束了大西洋两岸工业和消费者数月来的不确定性。【原文：The U.S. and the European Union agreed on a framework trade deal on Sunday, ending months of uncertainty for industry and consumers on both sides of the Atlantic.】

item.title: 欧盟冯德莱恩：贸易协议在不确定时期带来确定性
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周日表示，美国对欧盟进口商品征收 15%的基准税率将适用于汽车、半导体和医药产品。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen on Sunday said a U.S. baseline tariff rate of 15% on imported EU goods would apply to cars, semiconductors and pharmaceutical goods.】

item.title: 美国预计两周内对芯片进口调查有结果
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，特朗普政府将在两周内宣布对半导体进口进行国家安全调查的结果，但未提供详情。【原文：The Trump administration will announce the result of a national security probe into imports of semiconductors in two weeks, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Sunday, without providing details.】

item.title: VIEW 对美国和欧盟贸易协定的反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，美国和欧盟已就一项贸易协议达成协议，其中包括对欧盟进入美国的商品征收15%的关税，以及欧盟大量采购美国能源和军事装备。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said the United States and the European Union had reached agreement on a trade deal that includes a 15% tariff on EU goods entering the U.S. and significant EU purchases of U.S. energy and military equipment.】

item.title: 波音公司的合同提议遭工会成员拒绝
item.description: 在圣路易斯地区组装波音战斗机的工会成员周日以 "压倒性多数票 "否决了波音公司的合同提议。【原文：Union members who assemble Boeing's fighter jets in the St. Louis area have "overwhelmingly voted" to reject the company's contract offer on Sunday.】

item.title: 美国与欧盟达成贸易协议，欧盟将全面征收 15%的关税
item.description: 特朗普说，该协议包括欧盟对美国能源和军事装备的大量采购，以及欧盟对美国 6000 亿美元的投资。【原文：The deal includes significant EU purchases of U.S. energy and military equipment and $600 billion in investments in the U.S. by the European Union, Trump said.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国即将与中国达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，他的政府即将与中国达成一项贸易协议，但没有透露其他细节。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday his administration was close to reaching a trade deal with China, but gave no other details.】

item.title: 南华早报》报道：中美将在瑞典谈判中将关税暂停再延长90天
item.description: 据《南华早报》（SCMP）周日援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，北京和华盛顿有望在周一开始的斯德哥尔摩贸易谈判中将关税休战再延长三个月。【原文：Beijing and Washington are expected to extend their tariff truce by another three months at trade talks in Stockholm beginning on Monday, the South China Morning Post (SCMP) reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 孟加拉国订购 25 架波音飞机，作为推动缓解美国关税的一部分
item.description: 一位高级官员周日表示，孟加拉国已向波音公司订购了 25 架飞机，并加大了对主要美国商品的进口，以努力化解贸易紧张局势，降低特朗普政府征收的高额关税。【原文：Bangladesh has ordered 25 aircraft from Boeing and ramped up imports of key American goods in an effort to defuse trade tensions and bring down the steep tariffs imposed by the Trump administration, a senior official said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中美重启关税谈判，努力延长停战期
item.description: 中美两国高级谈判代表周一在斯德哥尔摩举行会晤，以解决两国贸易战核心的长期经济纠纷，旨在延长休战期，避免大幅提高关税。【原文：Senior U.S. and Chinese negotiators meet in Stockholm on Monday to tackle longstanding economic disputes at the centre of the countries' trade war, aiming to extend a truce keeping sharply higher tariffs at bay.】

item.title: 美国商务部长称特朗普非常喜欢 TikTok，但应用程序必须转为美国所有
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普喜欢TikTok，但这款由中国人拥有的短视频应用程序必须转为美国人所有。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump likes TikTok but the Chinese-owned short video app, used by some 170 million Americans, has to move to U.S. ownership, Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick said on Sunday.】
